data.message: Ah yes, people still talking about him dissing trump, seriously who tf cares at this point lmao, shits old news, get tf over it, its also hilarious to see haters keep talking shit about his career when they can't even get to his level of success, please do everyone a favor and off yourselves cause you're wasting everyone's time 😁, oh and btw, I couldn't give a single solitary fuck of how much hate I get from this comment cause its meaningless 😉
